#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	long long int n,c,t,t1,r=0,d,sum=0,x,t2,d1,d2;
	cin>>n;
	t=n;
	while(t>0)
	{
		d=t%10;
		t=t/10;
		r=r*10+d;
	}
	
	t1=r;
	t2=r/100000;
	
	c=1;
	while(c<=5)
	{
		d1=t1%10;
		d2=t2%10;
		sum=sum+(d1*d2);
		t1=t1/10;
		t2=t2/10;
		c++;
	}
	cout<<sum<<endl;
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
